actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend section 219 of the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to provide that certain persons displaced prior to January 2, 1971, by the Kaw Lake project of the Army Corps of Engineers may receive assistance under sections 202, 203, and 204 of such act.

summary.text: Provides that persons displaced prior to January 2, 1971, by the Kaw Lake project of the Army Corps of Engineers (located in Osage and Kaw Counties, Oklahoma, and Cowley County, Kansas) may receive assistance under the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act 1970. (Adds 42 U.S.C. 4639 (b))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 219 of the Uniform Relocation Assistance and Real Property Acquisition Policies Act of 1970 to provide that certain persons displaced prior to January 2, 1971, by the Kaw Lake project of the Army Corps of Engineers may receive assistance under sections 202, 203, and 204 of such act.
